title: Democratic Party of Arkansas
deleted: The Democratic Party of Arkansas has a platform standing on the following principles: law and order with justice, every citizen, regardless of religion or race, is entitled to an equal voice in government. With these principles comes a list of 52 rules.<ref>{{Cite web|last=|first=|date=|title=Rules of the Democratic Party of Arkansas 2018-2020|url=https://www.arkdems.org/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/FINAL-DPA-Rules-6.2.19_posted.pdf|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=October 9, 2020|website=Arkansas Democrats}}</ref> The platform is filled with values such as ethics, education, economic development and opportunity, agriculture, transportation and infrastructure, environment and energy, health care, Social Security/Medicaid/Medicare, taxes, military/veterans and national security, criminal justice, civil rights and civil liberties, and public service.<ref>{{Cite web|last=|first=|date=January 24, 2019|title=Our Platform|url=https://www.arkdems.org/our-platform/|url-status=live|archive-url=|archive-date=|access-date=October 9, 2020|website=Arkansas Democrats|language=en-US}}</ref>
